entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then rain beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 4 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with wet snow early in the morning and ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 7.
